partyNPCs.name: Scout Kira
partyNPCs.role: Local guide and eager ranger, expert on nearby trails

activeQuests.title: Desperate Defense
activeQuests.description: The party arrives at Rangers' Outpost to find it in crisis. Three caravans have been massacred in five days with unnatural precision. Ranger Elen desperately recruits the party to interrogate the captured Bandit Leader Rusk and uncover who is behind these coordinated attacks before the frontier falls completely.

activeQuests.title: Restore the Silver Bell Network
activeQuests.description: The outpost's silver bell communication system has been sabotaged or disrupted. Restoring it will reestablish contact with other ranger posts and provide early warning of future attacks.

activeQuests.title: Merchant's Dilemma
activeQuests.description: Trader Sila is considering abandoning the outpost due to the danger. Convincing her to stay will ensure continued supplies and maintain trade relationships vital to the frontier's survival.
